@YhiGhielgi seeing as she and her bf passed out I'd say she'd have an excessive amount inthis case. Also for most Asian ppl how their bodies interact with alcohol is a bit different from the rest of the world. They absorb and break down alcohol a lot faster but this also means alcohol hits them much faster and harder though this means they also recover and loose the intoxicated state faster. It does however make it much more dangerous for them to drink a large amount of alcohol in a short period of time. So for instance if I drink a pint of 10% alcohol in a few seconds I might just get buzzed in the short run, while a japanese might start puking from it.

@Another Boring Person alcohol can have that effect of numbing the body, it can affect men's erection and as for women they can lose sensitivity in their genital zone making them feel almost nothing, well if we are talking about an excess of alcohol ofc.

Wait, what? Alcohol made her body more sensitive? I was under the impression alcohol numbed a person's body. Granted, I have never drank any myself. Anyway, this is a general complaint for this genre, but I never get these ultimatums. "Reveal your current infidelity, or continue it and dig the hole six feet deeper." Which one is better? It is this contrived, idiotic logic that really sucks the entertainment value out. Whatever, I am talking into the void anyway.
